original_text: Have I committed an offence in abasing myself that ye might be exalted, because I have preached to you the gospel of God freely?
korean_text: 내가 너희를 높이려고 나를 낮추어 하나님의 복음을 값없이 너희에게 전함으로 죄를 지었느냐

sentences.original_text: Have I committed an offence in abasing myself
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 나 자신을 낮추어 죄를 지었습니까

sentences.original_text: because I have preached to you
